name: tcpwrite-activity
title: TCP Write Activity
description: Writes data to given TCP connection

settings.name: network
settings.description: Type of the network. Supported types are: tcp, tcp4 (IPv4-only), tcp6 (IPv6-only), udp, udp4 (IPv4-only), udp6 (IPv6-only), ip, ip4 (IPv4-only), ip6 (IPv6-only), unix, unixgram and unixpacket

settings.name: host
settings.description: Domain name or IP address of the host

settings.name: port
settings.description: Literal port number or a service name like http, domain etc

settings.name: delimiter
settings.description: Delimiter to break the input string data into individual messages
